casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jwana Cherise LAKE 112P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2019 Anton M. Lebedev, Attorney at Law, for Lake, Jwana. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney Generals, Adam Everett, Assistant District Attorney, Davis Cooper, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of March 2019 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of April 2019."
